amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: TITLE IX ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS SEC. 901. None of the funds made available in this Act to the Small Business Administration may be used for the San Francisco Planning and Urban Research Association, SPUR Urban Center.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 21 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds for the San Francisco Planning and Urban Research Association, SPUR Urban Center.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 102 - 317 (Roll no. 592).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 102 - 317 (Roll no. 592).
